title: Foundation Building - Week 3
subtitle: Adding variety and building strength
videoDescription: Discover how to add variety to your movement practice while maintaining consistency.
description: Time to add some variety! We'll introduce gentle bodyweight exercises and different movement patterns while maintaining your walking foundation.
objectives: Add movement variety to prevent boredom
Build functional strength for daily activities
keyPoints: Variety keeps movement interesting and sustainable
Functional strength improves quality of life
Stairs are a great free workout tool
